doc:
Pesach Burstein https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pesach_Burstein 0 Pesach "Peishachke" Burstein (April 15, 1896 – April 6, 1986) was a Polish-born American comedian, singer, coupletist, and director of Yiddish vaudeville/theater. His wife Lillian Lux, and son Mike Burstyn are also actors. Pesach_"_Peishachke_"_Burstein ( April_15_,_1896 – April_6_,_1986 ) was a_Polish-born_American_comedian , singer , coupletist , and director of Yiddish_vaudeville/theater . His_wife_Lillian_Lux , and son_Mike_Burstyn are also actors .
